Description: We are located in Central Illinois and have been in business for nearly 40 years. We carry products from some of the most respected manufacturers in the music industry including Fender, Vox, Dream Cymbals, Roland, Yamaha, Blackstar, Behringer, Takamine, ESP, Schecter, Shure, ADJ, Wampler, TC Electronic and more. Up for sale is an Aria Pro II Bass guitar. It is in solid playing condition with cosmetic wear you'd expect as normal in an older bass. We could not find any info on this bass so model number and year is unknown. The tuners are labeled "Gotoh Japan" if that helps. Shipping for this item is: $45 in the continental US. Sorry, no international shipping on this item. Please note, signature is required on all shipments. Please note: 20% restocking fee applies to returns for any reason that is not our fault. Please note that extra freight charges apply to shipments to Alaska and Hawaii; basically anything outside the continental US will have extra freight charges. Shipping 1. We ship via Fedex Ground for most Domestic shipments. 2. If you need expedited shipping, you will need to ask us if this is possible before bidding. We cannot guarantee expedited shipping. Business hours are M-F 10am-6pm, Sat 10am-4pm CST
Title: Vintage(?) Aria Pro II Bass guitar, P/J pickups, Gotoh tuners
